post.body: IDK but I was at his 1st show with the Dead back in '90- and many after. :)
Me too- altho the house just sold + will be traveling soon. (sorry for the earlier delayed rxn- I'm still figuring this out!)
How'd you guess ;) We are there practically every week. Maybe I've seen you there?
The holiday course looks amazing! Enjoy!!
ribbon? glue? the sticky part of a label? decorate a gift bag?
G'night twitter friends. Wishing you all a Joyous and Blessed Holiday!
Looks like Santa AND the Tooth Fairy will be making visit tonight! I wonder if they've met?
I finally accepted that I don't love recorded opera.
Good thing we decided to stay home for xmas. My mother honestly would have cried if she just heard my daughter praying to Santa Claus
